Interface RecommendationCriteria

  • All Known Implementing Classes:
    FriendOfFriend, Influencer, Random

    public interface RecommendationCriteria
    Represents the recommendation criteria interface.

      • recommendationBasedOnCriteria

        void recommendationBasedOnCriteria(TwitterGraph graph,
                                   Integer useerId,
                                   List<Integer> recommends,
                                   Integer numOfRecommend)
        Recommendation made based on different criteria.
        Parameters:
        graph - - the graph we have created by using import.
        useerId - - the specific useerId we are processing.
        recommends - - the user's recommendation list.
        numOfRecommend - - how many users the program will recommend.
